title: Top selling Nintendo DS games worldwide in 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
The Sales in million units is appeared to be the highest at Month New Super Mario Bros. and lowest at Month Super Mario 64 DS.
The highest value at Month New Super Mario Bros. is 2.78x times more than the lowest value at Super Mario 64 DS.
